title: Add Instagram and X social icons (header + footer), with glow hover and streamer-mode hiding

requirements.text: Update the footer social links to include clickable Instagram and X (Twitter) icons that open in a new tab and point to the provided profiles: https://instagram.com/babu_sarraf_ji and https://x.com/babu_sarraf_ji. Keep icon styling minimal/modern with proper spacing, a soft glow hover effect matching the dark “study vibe” theme, and ensure the icons are responsive on mobile and desktop.

quotes: Add Instagram icon in: Footer section
Link: https://instagram.com/babu_sarraf_ji Open in new tab
Add X icon next to Instagram icon
Clickable link: https://x.com/babu_sarraf_ji Open in new tab
Soft glow hover effect (match study vibe theme)

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows Instagram and X icons adjacent to each other with consistent sizing and spacing.
Clicking the Instagram icon opens https://instagram.com/babu_sarraf_ji in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
Clicking the X icon opens https://x.com/babu_sarraf_ji in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
Hovering either icon shows a soft glow effect consistent with the existing dark theme.
On small screens the footer layout remains readable and the icons do not overflow or overlap other footer content.

requirements.text: Add the same Instagram and X social icon links to the top-right corner of the landing page header (near the existing header/profile area), using the same minimal modern style, spacing, and soft glow hover effect. These header icons must open the provided links in a new tab.

quotes: Add Instagram icon in: Top right corner (near profile section)
Add X icon next to Instagram icon
Icons should be minimal and professional

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page header displays Instagram and X icons in the top-right area without disrupting the centered logo/tagline.
Both icons open the correct URLs in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
Icons are visually consistent with the footer versions (size, color, hover glow).
Header remains responsive (icons remain accessible and correctly positioned on mobile and desktop).

requirements.text: Add optional follow text under the timer in non-streamer mode: “Follow for daily study motivation – @babu_sarraf_ji”. Ensure it fits the minimal study aesthetic and does not appear in Streamer Mode.

quotes: Optional text under timer: “Follow for daily study motivation – @babu_sarraf_ji”
In Streamer Mode: Social icons should be hidden automatically

acceptanceCriteria: When streamerMode is false, the text “Follow for daily study motivation – @babu_sarraf_ji” renders beneath the timer area and matches the existing typography/color system.
When streamerMode is true, the follow text is not rendered.

requirements.text: Ensure any social icons rendered on the /timer route are automatically hidden when Streamer Mode is enabled (to keep the browser-source overlay clean).

quotes: In Streamer Mode: Social icons should be hidden automatically

acceptanceCriteria: On /timer, when Streamer Mode is ON, no social icons (Instagram/X) are visible anywhere on the page.
On /timer, when Streamer Mode is OFF, social icons (if shown on that route) display normally with the same styling/hover behavior as the landing page.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
All external links must open in a new tab and include rel="noopener noreferrer".
User-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication or social media API integrations (links only).
Do not add tracking/analytics for social link clicks.
Do not change core Pomodoro timer behavior beyond adding the optional follow text in non-streamer mode.
